isis.stitle: 530 and DT-466/408 Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1993) - EGED-115 DIAGNOSTIC ANALYSIS GUIDE FOR THE INTERNATIONAL(r) 530 and DT-408/466 DIESEL ENGINES WITH ROBERT BOSCH "P" INJECTION PUMP [FRONT SIDE] - SHUTOFF CABLE/ELECTRIC SHUTOFF - I. SHUTOFF CABLE (MANUAL SHUTOFF)

svcproc.title: I. SHUTOFF CABLE (MANUAL SHUTOFF)
svcproc.para:
With the shutoff cable pulled out to stop the engine, the shutoff lever must contact the shutoff screw, as shown in Figure 5.4
.
To ensure that the control rack is not restricted by the shutoff lever during engine operation perform the following steps to properly adjust the shutoff cable.

step1.para: Loosen the screw which secures the shutoff cable to the shutoff lever.
Push the shutoff cable knob in the cab to fully seat it against the instrument panel.
Place the shutoff lever in the (Full Run-Fuel On Position). Move shutoff lever 1/16" to 1/8" away from (Full Run-Fuel On Position). Secure cable to lever.
